channel.title: Errors while updating/upgrading whonix
channel.description: W: Size of file /var/lib/apt/lists/partial/www.whonix.org_download_whonixdevelopermetafiles_internal_dists_jessie_InRelease is not what the server reported 13137 154 W: Size of file /var/lib/apt/lists/partial/www.whonix.org_download_whonixdevelopermetafiles_internal_dists_jessie_main_binary-i386_Packages.gz is not what the server reported 47050 32394 ? is this a malicious attachment to a file(s) ? or is just a bug ?

item.title: Errors while updating/upgrading whonix

item.description:
Very first post in this forum (stickied).

Size of file dists_jessie_main_binary-amd64_Packages.gz is not what the server reported Support
problems when you upgrade. what it means and how to fix? :... is not what the server reported
